item.title: Version 1.0.0
item.description:
New features

  • Updated to Oculus Runtime 1.10.0
  • Updated to OpenVR 1.0.4
  • Improved Oculus Touch support
  • Added Oculus Touch Haptics support
  • Added Oculus tutorial experiences to the dashboard
  • Added Revive tray icon; the ReviveInjector and RevivePatch have been moved to the tray icon
  • Added an automatic update checker

Bug fixes

  • Unreal games with OpenVR support crash when launched with Revive (#312)
  • Dashboard fails to remove uninstalled games until restart
  • Prevent the user from attempting to start an application multiple times
